chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:

Hi there, the UPS says that I can't get it delivered to my address (even though my name is on the apartment). I tried to change the address but it won't let me. Can you help me please?

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

The customer's parcel has been at a pickup point since 15/05. Please ask the customer to pick up their parcel or it will be returned to us. Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

Please disregard the previous message. Please provide us with the updated address in the following format:

NAME
ADDRESS
POST CODE
TOWN/STREET NAME
COUNTRY
PHONE NUMBER

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

please send the parcel to this pickupstation:

Muskauer Str. 47, 
10997 Berlin, 
Germany
+491573 3190969
campbellbews@gmail.com

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the change of address.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

the package arrived at your warehouse today.

Please resend it within the next 24 hours and provide us with a TL.

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The tracking lD is 1ZBF1560D901155845 and the link for the delivery is https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&tracknum=1ZBF1560D900253213&requester=WT/trackdetails Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello ecomobile,


We wanted to let you know Campbell Bews hasn’t received their order.

The tracking link doesn't work, so we’re unable to check the package's location.

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?
In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.

If you've shipped the order but it's lost, we will gather the paperwork from the customer and forward it to you. We'll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment.

If the delivery starts moving again, a refund won’t be issued, and the order will be considered late.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Thanks for your help,

Celia-Cristina, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The order has reached our warehouse, we are arranging a reshipment of the parcel back to the customer. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile


Thank you for your message.

If possible, we'll do it today.


Regards,
Celia-Cristina from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Our logistics partner has informed us that the parcel is being reshipped to the customer. We will provide the tracking number soon. 

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Our logistics partner has informed us that the TN is 1ZBF1560D901155845. It has already been delivered to the customer.

Regards,
RK
